name: Burger Boy (Chop's Teen Club)
description:
Play as Burger Boy in a platformer adventure where you save your Fry Buddies. Test your platforming skills by facing difficult jumps, and enemies!

Credits:
Made with GameMaker 1.4
Sounds made with sfxr
Created by Carl Dehnert, Tina Dang, and Jackson Richie

Created during the Spring 2018 Gamemaker Work Ready Class
